attributes.action: Allow the consumption of alcohol in student colleges.
attributes.additional_details: Drinking has been proven to improve work rate, when in small amounts. As the majority of the country is in tier 3 lockdown, we feel as if it would be enticing for young students (of age) to consume limited amounts of their favorite alcohol in class.
attributes.background: We would ask the government to allow students and teachers to consume alcohol on college premises.

rejection.details: The consumption of alcohol on college premises is a decision for individual colleges, not the UK Government or Parliament.
